BBDP1.Q.DE.N.BP.O.B1A0000000.I10.A: Construction price index / Germany / Unadjusted figure / Total

Methodology: 1 Source: Bundesbank calculations using Federal Statistical Office data. - 2 Territorial definition: 1968 Q1 to 1990 Q4, western Germany; from 1991 Q1, Germany. - 3 Methodology: From 1968 Q1 to 1987 Q4: Series for western Germany based on 1991 = 100 chain-linked with the series for Germany based on 1995 = 100 via 1988 Q1.  From 1988 Q1 to 1994 Q4:Aggregation of partial series recalculated by the Federal Statistical Office. From 1968 Q1 to 1999 Q4: Series based on 1995 = 100 chain-linked with the series based on 2000 = 100 via 2000 Q1. From 2000 Q1 to 2004 Q4: Aggregation of partial series calculated by the Federal Statistical Office. From 1968 Q1 to 2004 Q4: Series based on 2000 = 100 chain-linked with the series based on 2005 = 100 via 2005 Q1. From 2005 Q1: Aggregation of partial series calculated by the Federal Statistical Office. From 1968 Q1 to 2009 Q4: Series based on 2005 = 100 chain-linked with the series based on 2010 = 100 via 2010 Q1. From 2010 Q1: Aggregation of partial series calculated by the Federal Statistical Office.
